that's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":129446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んーーーーっ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmmmmm,\""},{"lineNumber":129447,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それなら退屈だし、私はそろそろ","translatedEnglishLine":" ship...\""},{"lineNumber":129449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ロッキー君、貴方はまだここで待つのかしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rocky-kun, are you still going to wait here?\""},{"lineNumber":129450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うう、実はちょっと悩んでるだす。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ugh, actually, I'm a little troubled.\""},{"lineNumber":129451,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様のそばにいたいのは当たり前だすが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course I want to stay near Lord Rance, but...\""},{"lineNumber":129452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだか嫌な予感がするだす……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I have a bad feeling about this...\""},{"lineNumber":129453,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こう、とんでもないことが起きてるのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Like, something outrageous is happening,"},{"lineNumber":129454,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに気づけていないような……」","translatedEnglishLine":" but it seems like no one has noticed...\""},{"lineNumber":129455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんな場所で、ボーッとしてたら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I just zone out in a place like this,"},{"lineNumber":129456,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何かまずいような……」","translatedEnglishLine":" something bad might happen...\""},{"lineNumber":129457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら、外に出てみたら？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, why don't you go outside and see?\""},{"lineNumber":129458,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス君達はまだ出てこないようだし」","translatedEnglishLine":" \"It seems Rance and the others haven't come out yet.\""},{"lineNumber":129459,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうだすな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That's true.\""},{"lineNumber":129460,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おら、人の多そうな街にでも行ってみるだす」","translatedEnglishLine":" \"I'll try going to a city that seems crowded.\""},{"lineNumber":129461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「街ね。なら男の子モンスターを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A city, huh? Then my destination—looking for male monsters—doesn't match yours.\""},{"lineNumber":129462,"originalJapaneseLine":"　探す私とは目的地は合わないわね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We have different goals.\""},{"lineNumber":129463,"originalJapaneseLine":"「途中まで一緒に行くだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll go partway with you.\""},{"lineNumber":129464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":129465,"originalJapaneseLine":"　というわけだから、メガッス君達、","translatedEnglishLine":" \"So, Megass-kun and the others,"},{"lineNumber":129466,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また会いましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":" let's meet again.\""},{"lineNumber":129467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お世話になりましただ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you for everything.\""},{"lineNumber":129468,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うむ。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm. Nnnu\""},{"lineNumber":129469,"originalJapaneseLine":"ベゼルアイとロッキーは宇宙船を出て行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Bezel Eye and Rocky left the spaceship."},{"lineNumber":129470,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":129471,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":129472,"originalJapaneseLine":"三年後――","translatedEnglishLine":"Three years later—"},{"lineNumber":129473,"originalJapaneseLine":"コールドスリープ室――","translatedEnglishLine":"Cold sleep chamber—"},{"lineNumber":129474,"originalJapaneseLine":"メガッス達がコールドスリープ装置の前に","translatedEnglishLine":"Megass and the others gathered in front of the cold sleep device."},{"lineNumber":129475,"originalJapaneseLine":"集まっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were gathered."},{"lineNumber":129476,"originalJapaneseLine":"『……さて、開けるべきか否か』","translatedEnglishLine":"'...Well then, should we open it or not?'"},{"lineNumber":129477,"originalJapaneseLine":"『……あれから三年か』","translatedEnglishLine":"'...It's been three years since then.'"},

{"lineNumber":129478,"originalJapaneseLine":"『すっかり存在を忘れていたわ……","translatedEnglishLine":"'I had completely forgotten it existed...'"},

{"lineNumber":129479,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうしたものかしらねぇ……』","translatedEnglishLine":"'What should we do now...' "},

{"lineNumber":129480,"originalJapaneseLine":"『……もう出したところでなぁ』","translatedEnglishLine":"'...Even if we bring them out now...'"},

{"lineNumber":129481,"originalJapaneseLine":"『そうねぇ。","translatedEnglishLine":"'That's true."},

{"lineNumber":129482,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも、だからこそ私は出した方がいいと思う。","translatedEnglishLine":" But precisely because of that, I think we should bring them out."},

{"lineNumber":129483,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その辺りも含めて、本人達に判断させないと』","translatedEnglishLine":" Including all that, they should be the ones to decide.'"},

{"lineNumber":129484,"originalJapaneseLine":"『俺は……』","translatedEnglishLine":"'I...'"},

{"lineNumber":129485,"originalJapaneseLine":"『……俺は反対だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"'...I am against it."},

{"lineNumber":129486,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今更、外の世界を見せるのはあまりに酷だ』","translatedEnglishLine":" Showing them the outside world at this point is just too cruel.'"},

{"lineNumber":129487,"originalJapaneseLine":"『優しいのねぇ、メガフォースは』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Megaforce, you’re so kind.'"},

{"lineNumber":129488,"originalJapaneseLine":"『茶化すなよ』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Don’t mock me.'"},

{"lineNumber":129489,"originalJapaneseLine":"『もちろん、出すか否かは先生にお任せします』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Of course, whether to bring them out or not is up to the teacher.' "},

{"lineNumber":129490,"originalJapaneseLine":"『…………ふむ』","translatedEnglishLine":"'...Hmm.' "},

{"lineNumber":129491,"originalJapaneseLine":"『開けよう』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Let's open it.' "},

{"lineNumber":129492,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうして、ランス達は三年後の世界で","translatedEnglishLine":"And so, Rance and the others awakened in a world three years later."},

{"lineNumber":129493,"originalJapaneseLine":"目を覚ました。","translatedEnglishLine":"They opened their eyes."},

{"lineNumber":129494,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},

{"lineNumber":129495,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},

{"lineNumber":129496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、今が三年後だと……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-is it really three years later now...?\""},

{"lineNumber":129497,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、こうしていられるか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, I can't just stay like this!"},

{"lineNumber":129498,"originalJapaneseLine":"　外に出て俺の女達に会いに行くぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":" I'll go outside to see my women!\""},{"lineNumber":129499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待て、その前に大事な話があります。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, before that, there is something important to talk about."},

{"lineNumber":129500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　外の世界には出ん方がいい。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":" You better not go outside. Nnnu\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、まだ五ヶ月経っておらぬ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, it hasn't even been five months yet. Nnnu"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、本当？」
「まあ、いいわ」
「んーーーーっ、
それなら退屈だし、私はそろそろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "in that case, I'm bored, so I think I'll soon"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この船の外に出ようかしら……」
「ロッキー君、貴方はまだここで待つのかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rocky-kun, are you still going to wait here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……うう、実はちょっと悩んでるだす。
ランス様のそばにいたいのは当たり前だすが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course I want to stay near Lord Rance, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだか嫌な予感がするだす……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have a bad feeling about this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こう、とんでもないことが起きてるのに、
それに気づけていないような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it seems like no one has noticed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな場所で、ボーッとしてたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I just zone out in a place like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かまずいような……」
「なら、外に出てみたら？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, why don't you go outside and see?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君達はまだ出てこないようだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems Rance and the others haven't come out yet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうだすな。
おら、人の多そうな街にでも行ってみるだす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll try going to a city that seems crowded."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「街ね。なら男の子モンスターを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A city, huh? Then my destination—looking for male monsters—doesn't match yours."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 探す私とは目的地は合わないわね」
「途中まで一緒に行くだ」
「そうね。
というわけだから、メガッス君達、
また会いましょう」
「お世話になりましただ」
「……うむ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
ベゼルアイとロッキーは宇宙船を出て行った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bezel Eye and Rocky left the spaceship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三年後――
コールドスリープ室――
メガッス達がコールドスリープ装置の前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megass and the others gathered in front of the cold sleep device.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集まっていた。
『……さて、開けるべきか否か』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: '...Well then, should we open it or not?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『……あれから三年か』
『すっかり存在を忘れていたわ……
どうしたものかしらねぇ……』
『……もう出したところでなぁ』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: '...Even if we bring them out now...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『そうねぇ。
でも、だからこそ私は出した方がいいと思う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But precisely because of that, I think we should bring them out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺りも含めて、本人達に判断させないと』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Including all that, they should be the ones to decide.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『……俺は反対だ。
今更、外の世界を見せるのはあまりに酷だ』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Showing them the outside world at this point is just too cruel.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『優しいのねぇ、メガフォースは』
『茶化すなよ』
『もちろん、出すか否かは先生にお任せします』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Of course, whether to bring them out or not is up to the teacher.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『開けよう』
こうして、ランス達は三年後の世界で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, Rance and the others awakened in a world three years later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目を覚ました。
「い、今が三年後だと……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-is it really three years later now...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、こうしていられるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I can't just stay like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外に出て俺の女達に会いに行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go outside to see my women!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待て、その前に大事な話があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, before that, there is something important to talk about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外の世界には出ん方がいい。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You better not go outside. Nnnu"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bezel Eye and Rocky left the spaceship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三年後――
コールドスリープ室――
メガッス達がコールドスリープ装置の前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megass and the others gathered in front of the cold sleep device.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集まっていた。
『……さて、開けるべきか否か』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: '...Well then, should we open it or not?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『……あれから三年か』
『すっかり存在を忘れていたわ……
どうしたものかしらねぇ……』
『……もう出したところでなぁ』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: '...Even if we bring them out now...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『そうねぇ。
でも、だからこそ私は出した方がいいと思う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But precisely because of that, I think we should bring them out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺りも含めて、本人達に判断させないと』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Including all that, they should be the ones to decide.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『……俺は反対だ。
今更、外の世界を見せるのはあまりに酷だ』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Showing them the outside world at this point is just too cruel.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『優しいのねぇ、メガフォースは』
『茶化すなよ』
『もちろん、出すか否かは先生にお任せします』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Of course, whether to bring them out or not is up to the teacher.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『開けよう』
こうして、ランス達は三年後の世界で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, Rance and the others awakened in a world three years later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目を覚ました。
「い、今が三年後だと……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-is it really three years later now...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、こうしていられるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, I can't just stay like this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外に出て俺の女達に会いに行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go outside to see my women!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待て、その前に大事な話があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, before that, there is something important to talk about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外の世界には出ん方がいい。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You better not go outside. Nnnu"
